titleStmt.title: Roome for companie, heere comes good fellowes To a pleasant new tune.

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names and date of publication from STC.
In two parts, printed side by side. The second part has title: The second part of Roome for Company. &c..
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
